title: Watch Tsitsipas' five best hot shots from Dubai title run
description: Stefanos Tsitsipas produced plenty of highlight-reel moments at the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships. From executing explosive backhands to crafting delicate drop shots, the 26-year-old struck jaw-dropping shots all week to clinch his maiden ATP 500 title with finesse. Watch the playlist below of Tsitsipas' best hot shots from the week. [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Watch the best hot shots from Stefanos Tsitsipas at the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships.

html:
Hot Shot

Watch the video playlist below

March 01, 2025

RYAN LIM/AFP via Getty Images

Stefanos Tsitsipas in action at the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships. By ATP Staff

Stefanos Tsitsipas produced plenty of highlight-reel moments at the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships.

From executing explosive backhands to crafting delicate drop shots, the 26-year-old struck jaw-dropping shots all week to clinch his maiden ATP 500 title with finesse.

Watch the playlist below of Tsitsipas' best hot shots from the week.
